log.content: I would like you to create an svg image of a sunset through the mountains. Make sure the result is visible in index.html

function.name: create_file
function.arguments:
{"content":"<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <title>Sunset through Mountains</title>
</head>
<body>
    <svg width="800" height="600">
        <defs>
            <linearGradient id="sunset" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
                <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:orange; stop-opacity:1" />
                <stop offset="50%" style="stop-color:pink; stop-opacity:1" />
                <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:purple; stop-opacity:1" />
            </linearGradient>
        </defs>
        <rect width="800" height="600" fill="url(#sunset)" />
        <!-- Mountains -->
        <path d="M50,550 L200,300 L400,350 L600,300 L800,550 Z" fill="#556B2F" />
    </svg>
</body>
</html>","file_name":"index.html"}
